description.value:
You have trained for countless hours to become a skilled hunter and tracker, gaining an additional benefit when you Hunt Prey depending on the focus of your training. Choose one of the following hunter's edges:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Hunter's Edge: Flurry]{Hunter's Edge: Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Hunter's Edge: Outwit]{Hunter's Edge: Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Hunter's Edge: Precision]{Hunter's Edge: Precision}
